name: Hubbard Ave
description: The end of Hubbard Avenue, where the town gives way to open farmland. You are at the southern end of Hubbard Ave. The road ends here, not with a grand vista, but with a large, fragrant pile of hay, a subtle reminder of the agricultural roots of Hill Valley. Hubbard Ave continues its journey to the north, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and charming homes. The air is thick with the smell of the farm, a stark contrast to the suburban aspirations of the town.
